message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go above that.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I'm willing to work with you.  However, $8,500 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $9,500, which is still a fair price considering the value you've placed on the product. Let me know if you're interested.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $9,500 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $9,250. Can you consider that?
